title: Classic Swiss fondue
ingredients: ['225 to 350g (8 to 12 oz) Gruyere cheese, grated', '225 to 350g (8 to 12 oz) Emmental cheese, grated', '2 to 4 teaspoons plain flour', '1/3 to 1/2 dry white wine', 'lemon juice', '1 clove garlic, halved', 'black pepper', 'nutmeg', 'kirsch', 'To serve', 'cubed French bread', 'boiled new potatoes', 'cornichons and pickled onions']
